attributes.action: police forces should have a restricted criteria for issueing european arrest warrants
attributes.additional_details:
police forces should not be able to issue european arrest warrants without evidence of a crime and consulting with cps and home office and the should not be used in cases were there has been no crime commited and they are just worried about the welfare of a individual
They should not be allowed to issue them without first providing evidence that the person has committed  a crime
